channel.title: üè¢ NVIDIA on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in üè¢ NVIDIA on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Guiding a Diffusion Model with a Bad Version of Itself
item.description: Boost image quality in diffusion models without reducing variation using Autoguidance: guide a high-quality model with a less-trained version of itself!

item.title: MaskLLM: Learnable Semi-Structured Sparsity for Large Language Models
item.description: MaskLLM learns efficient semi-structured sparsity in LLMs via end-to-end training, achieving significant speedup and memory reduction without sacrificing performance.

item.title: Memorize What Matters: Emergent Scene Decomposition from Multitraverse
item.description: 3D Gaussian Mapping (3DGM) achieves self-supervised camera-only 3D scene decomposition by leveraging multi-traverse driving data, memorizing permanent structures while filtering out transient objects.
